docna.cdata!:
Bangladesh - Twelfth Imports Program :
            Credit 1471 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Bangladesh - Twelfth Imports
            Program : Credit 1471 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

repnme.cdata!: Bangladesh - Twelfth Imports Program Credit Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Twelfth Imports Program Credit
            Project will provide foreign exchange to finance general
            imports. In order to reduce Bangladesh's dependence on
            concessional aid inflows for financing its import bill, the
            Government has agreed in the context of negotiations for
            this Credit to undertake policy and administrative
            improvements in public sector financial resource
            mobilization and management, in financial sector policies,
            in agricultural and food policies, and in industrial and
            trade policies.

docna.cdata!: Bangladesh - Twelfth Imports Program Credit Project

display_title.display_title:
Bangladesh - Twelfth Imports
            Program Credit Project
